result.arabic_text: قُل لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ سَتُغۡلَبُونَ وَتُحۡشَرُونَ إِلَىٰ جَهَنَّمَۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمِهَادُ
result.translation: 12. Nabiyow koroosite marak diggah isin Addunyal Buksumettoonuuh Siinik Ayse-lon, Qhiyaamah Ayró jahannam girai kobxisimetton, jahannam girâ is manxu gacta fidooy keenik ixxic.
